author: Retro Game Corps
description:
The ROG Xbox Ally X is a nice upgrade from last year's Ally X, but the addition of an Xbox partnership and their clunky, unfinished Full Screen Experience software makes it a somewhat confusing launch.  Let's discuss why the hardware is great, and how everything else is a hot mess.

More info: https://bestbuy.7tiv.net/qzaJeq
Xbox Play Anywhere list: https://www.xbox.com/en-US/games/browse?PlayWith=PC%2CXboxPlayAnywhere

Accessories:
Waterfield: https://www.sfbags.com/collections/rog-xbox-ally-x-cases
dbrand: https://dbrand.com/shop/killswitch/rog-xbox-ally-x-cases
tomtoc: https://amzn.to/43rww4u

This was a review unit sent to me by the manufacturer.  All opinions are my own, they did not see this review ahead of time, and no money was exchanged in any way.

title: Awesome Handheld PC! (But Lousy Xbox)
